timeline.bodyText: @4brunu I notice that the value has been flipped from true to false int the sample code. Is that expected?
timeline.author: wing328
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,7 +32,7 @@ Test serialization of outer boolean types
 // The following code samples are still beta. For any issue, please report via http://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator/issues/new
 import PetstoreClient
 
-let body = false // Bool | Input boolean as post body (optional)
+let body = true // Bool | Input boolean as post body (optional)

replies.bodyText:
I was also surprised.
That happen after running the pet projects.
The input spec has changed, but I didn't change it.
replies.author: 4brunu

replies.bodyText: I'll take another look after merging this PR instead.
replies.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: Looks like that's the correct behavior: https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator/blob/master/modules/openapi-generator/src/main/java/org/openapitools/codegen/DefaultCodegen.java#L1421 (and it was fixed somehow)
replies.author: wing328
